message: Congratulations! You're one of the first customers to try out our new product! As a valued customer, I'm offering you an exclusive deal. But think about the potential reward - a product worth $400! I'm offering it to you for the same price as the others, $100. What do you say? Will you take the chance?
I appreciate the exclusive deal and the confidence in your product. Given the potential reward and the risk involved, I'm willing to take a chance on this high-quality item. Thank you for the offer.
